metadata.title: CVE-2023-52658 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Revert "net/mlx5: Block entering switchdev mode with ns inconsistency"This reverts commit 662404b24a4c4d839839ed25e3097571f5938b9b.The revert is required due to the suspicion it is not good for anythingand cause crash.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
